text: Aleksandr Yermilov (; born November 12, 1960) is a Soviet flatwater kayaker/sprint canoer who competed in the early 1980s. He won four medal at the ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships with three golds (K-4 10000 m: 1981 in Nottingham, Great Britain, 1982 in Belgrade, Yugoslavia; 1983 in Tampere, Finland) and a silver (K-4 1000 m: 1981).http://www.smso.net/1981_ICF_Flatwater_Racing_World_Championships He was born in Kharkiv, Ukraine. In the 1990s he immigrated to Israel. Then to Canada. ==References== ;Inline ;General * * Category:Living people Category:Soviet male canoeists Category:1960 births Category:Kayakers Category:Sportspeople from Kharkiv Category:Ukrainian male canoeists Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:Honoured Masters of Sport of the USSR
title: Aleksandr Yermilov
